June 18, 1858 D Alston Contest
Alston Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
alston-contest
None
Alston, Cumbria, England, UK Music played:
Warwick Bridge Band, Quick March, “The German” (Crozier); Polka, “The Alliance” (Marriott). Allendale Town Band, Valse, “The Venetia” ( Jackson); March, “Napoleon's Imperial” (Anon) Nenthead Band, March, “The Papal State” (Tadolini); Valse, “The Pride of the North” (Brandon) Haydon Bridge Band, Cavatina, “La Sonnambula” (Bellini); Pas Redouble, “La Sonuambula” Alston Band, Overture, “Tancredi” (Rossini); “Fantasia on Scotch Airs” (Childe) Dufton Band, Grand March, “Le Tete de Bronze” (Auber); Overture, “Le Macon” (Auber) Weardale Band, Overture, “The Caliph of Bagdad” (Boieldieu); Quadrille, “The Wedding”, (D'Albert)
